Standard office cleaning (force average per m2 per year)
Additional information: Information provided for planned cleaning cost for Police Office. Average cost excludes some sites. The Metropolitan Police Service's pricing model incorporates the bulk of cleaning costs associated with custody cleaning, including cell decontamination during core custody cleaning hours. It is therefore not possible to abstract this element from the rate per m2. The force has however adjusted planned costs per m2 to omit periodical costs (wash downs, window cleaning and kitchen deep cleans). Volume is annual.
